metadata.name: Bipolarity
metadata.description:
"Bipolarity" is the first art work in the "Exfoliations" collection. Despite the fact that the name refers us to something dual, we should not forget that in this company there is always a third. The one who experiences it all. That is why I decided to make "Bipolarity" part of my glitch triptych.
Abstract paintings drawn with real paints were taken as a basis for this work and converted to 3D model. 
This setup was then placed in a real-time graphical environment in order to distort it with GLSL code.
